transcripts.text: Hello, it's Greg Gutfeld, one smart person and Greg Gutfeld, today's smart person, Dr.  Drew.  I don't think I need to read an introduction.  You know who he is. case a the city of los angeles conservatively has absorbed 800 000 undocumented immigrants last year.  a year and a half 800 000 people without a job without money without a family without a place to stay without a country.  800 000 people have found a place to live in los angeles.  yes they found a place to live.  yes.  so this idea that it's housing is a hoax from top to bottom or The glory of our sanctuary city has pushed people into the street by bringing in 800,000 undocumented, which I'm not prepared to say.
